attributes.contentHtml: so this states that mehost is unproffesional cus they cant protect their own data and thus they lost user data

attributes.title: ACCUSAATION of the user R6_Clapz#0007/Zachery#0007 By the organisation Mehost

attributes.contentHtml: Zachery We can't protect our own data? We lost some logs due to someone running rm -rf. You say it's not you but then who did it? Someone has to take the blame. If were unprofessional, okay! It was you or neil that ran rm -rf, It was probably you though, but come on. Can you prove your point? You said you had proof and you would send it when dchu cane but dchu came and you have no proof?
